label: 琴
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A seven-stringed, unfretted koto (see entry) from China.  It was popular during the first half of the ninth century and was played as part of an aristocrat’s normal accomplishments up to the mid-tenth (the present of the tale).  By the end of the century it had been all but abandoned.[琴・箏][RK]
